name: Love Potion
loreDescription: It is said to be a magic potion of love, but in reality it is a potion that makes people honest about their innermost feelings.

skillDescription.base: Increases the effect of all healing received by an ally by 5.0%. If the effect overlaps, only the effect with higher rate will be applied.
skillDescription.max: Increases the effect of all healing received by an ally by 10.0%. If the effect overlaps, only the effect with higher rate will be applied.
